attributes.action: Halt the increase in student top up fees if not scrap them alltogether
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you may or not be aware the government is thinking of upping the student top up fee’s for UK student from £3,000 to £7,000 for 2009.
This would mean that someone starting a 3 degree course in 2009 could end up leaving university with £41,000 debt and the interest each year on this debt alone would be over £1,000. 

This would mean that for some students the cost of university would outweigh the extra income they earn over their lifetime from gaining their degree, especially art and humanity degrees where salaries are lower.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
